Your perpetual infusions improve, allowing you to use @Compendium[pf2e.classfeatures.Quick Alchemy]{Quick Alchemy} to create more powerful items with no cost. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

Moderate @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Antidote (Moderate)]{Antidote} and @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Antiplague (Moderate)]{Antiplague}.
